name: Shake Shack Forest Hills
address: 71-24 Austin St, Forest Hills, NY 11375, USA

reviews.text:
Sucks!

Pay your staff more! Maybe they'd care how they prepare the food or even get it right. The faults ok Shake Shack!!!
Great burgers, nice ambiance and great staff!

One of my favorite spots of this chain in the city â€” Shake Shack! I come here often and love trying different burgers or my all-time favorite milkshakes. The Cookies flavor is absolutely the best (sorry, Oreo fans!). Iâ€™ve already made all my friends fall in love with it too. Everything here is always clean, quick, and delicious. The team is super friendly â€” if you donâ€™t understand something or feel like youâ€™ve been waiting too long, theyâ€™ll always explain and help with a smile. Thank you, guys! Youâ€™re amazing â€” Iâ€™ll definitely be back! ğŸªğŸ”ğŸ¥¤
Fast, accurate and friendly staff.  Great food!
I don't come to Shake Shack often,but every time I do, they always have new menu items. I usually get a Double Smoke Stack, and the patties always have a nice crust and cooked well.
One of the servers was very nice and helpful. She was on point and professional. Not sure what her name was.
Staff very bad
Craig is amazing!! So kind and accommodating! Thank you to the entire night team for working hard and keeping a positive attitude!!
Love the custard!
Somewhat unlike Shake Shack near Time Square, the food especially the burger patties are not great.  This was my two recent experiences with this Forest Hills location.

The crew was swamped today but they were still very attentive and very nice. Especially Caren!!! #givecarenaraise!!! Serious tho the food was great and service was amazing 10/10 would come again just for the crew that worked tonight!!

Terrible! Used to be good but now itâ€™s not good anymore.I ordered cheeseburger with lettuce and tomato and I got plain cheeseburger ğŸ˜“cheese fries was cold and cheese on top of the fries was so tick , I couldnâ€™t eat it. Very disappointed. Btw it was Forest Hills location.
Nothing particularly special compared to other Shack Shacks, but staff are friendly and usually not too crowded. Burgers and fries still great.
This place is always clean and the get your food out fast. Tye helped us out today and was such a sweetheart. We love it here
Delivery order was wrong. Shake shack needs to start requiring PhDs for employment and 6 months training every year.

The staff was super nice and welcoming. They brought us trays, napkins, and straws, which was really convenient since we didnâ€™t have to keep going back and forth. I came in with my family, and everyone was very friendly. The food was delicious, and so were the drinks.
Best burger in FH, price and quality wise, can't be beat.
This shack is big. Two stories big. Should we call this a double shack with some character? Probably. Itâ€™s a cool building and the burgers hit the spot.
Food was great as always â€“ fresh and tasty! The only downside was the longer wait time
Messed up my order.  Then waited another 30 minutes after already waiting 30-40 minutes.   I was not happy!  They are not the nicest people working there!
Good staff !! They take allergy seriously vs other stores !!
This Shake Shack isn't like the ones in Manhattan. The milk shakes were melted. The fries were soggy. The burger and chicken sandwich were not fresh.

My sister and I have been to this place before and ordered the mushroom burger and my sister ordered the cheese fries with coke to drink. The food was wonderful. The service was wonderful, and the atmosphere was that there were lots of people.

Clean and modern Shake Shack location. You can use the tablets for seamless ordering. Even though it is on Austin Street, the restaurant is located off of the main thoroughfare Continental Avenue so finding it may be a bit of a challenge.
Clean and great staff
The Food is So Good and the the options are good too.
I love this location. I love to sit, eat & people watch.
The food at shake shack is great! Quick service, and good prices for the quality of the food. Would come again
I came at 10:26pm and all the employees were sitting down and they told me that the kitchen was close with a nasty attitude....

Tye was an absolute pleasure to speak with. Super friendly, easygoing, and incredibly knowledgeable. We had a great back-and-forth conversation, and he took the time to answer every question we threw his wayâ€”no matter how specific. You can tell he knows his stuff and genuinely cares about helping people.
I love this place near my house
Best food and service
Delicious very big location with seating and friendly warm environment
The food was great. The place and service was OK.

I prefer the Jamaica location but was in the area and ordered on the app.  They didnâ€™t put the side of cheese for my fries in the bag but they put two honey mustard and two shack sauces.  Just shows the employees donâ€™t care what they give you.  The food was stale,  chicken was really greasy.  I would request a refund but i canâ€™t reach anyone in the managers office over the phone.  I will probably have to go through my bank.  I wonâ€™t order from this location again.
It was great! I like it!

Being a regular eater here, it is such a shame that a person has to be interrogated whether they are a paying customer or not in order to gain access to the bathroom code.

Employees here should not have to pressure and question their paying members to verify whether they purchased an item or not to use a basic service which should be offered. Getting mad at such a simple request is crazy.

It is not the customers fault that they do not receive a bathroom code on the receipt nor through the digital ordering system, yet the person who orders food here suffers as a result of just asking a basic question.

Do better.
Food was good and well-cooked (although IMO the burger size was a little small).

I donâ€™t eat fast food but my kids like it, and they like food of Shake Shack.
Service is great.
Very friendly staff and great atmosphere
Beautiful place, good food, fast service, and clean. But we stood at the counter for about 10 minutes before we realized we were supposed to use the kiosk. No one said anything to us.

This is my â€˜homeâ€™ Shake Shack and for me quite literally the best. Whenever I go to any other shake shack in the city or in Long Island I hold them to the standards of this specific establishment. You are all amazing thank you so much for always being clean, organized, prompt and friendly not only to me but to my family as well. Yâ€™all are awesome! Keep up the great work! ğŸ’›ğŸ˜

Staff is very friendly and helpful, and this location is neat, clean, and spacious. When I visited, 4-22-25, the women who attended to me made my day. Will visit again when in the area.

I wish there were more cashiers instead of self-serve kiosks. The human interaction makes all the difference. Shake Shack's mood lighting is a nice touch. This location is open until *very* late daily, a much-appreciated rarity for the neighborhood.

The mushroom burger is delicious! The fries are pretty good as well, with or without cheese. That said, the cheese sauce tastes great for fast food. I ordered the 'shroom burger with cheese fries, no drink for ~ $18.

Their special milkshakes sounded good and must go fast because they were sold out by nighttime.
Great place to go. Place clean and staff very helpful if have problem doing order on  computer to order. Order is done quickly and accurately.  Highly recommend going there

I can say I have never been to a terrible shake shack. I got my regular chicken nuggets and French fries. As I love it from shake shack and it was delicious consistent across the board. The wait time was a little annoying. It was about fifteen minutes and it wasn't busy, but it was properly mobile ? If you're with somebody, the wait time wouldn't affect you.

I can safely say I've never been to a bad Shake Shack since I first began going to the franchise 8 years ago. It's one of the more pricier burger joints but it's definitely worth it's money in service, quality and overall vibe. I can always come around to any location and expect high shelf service and it's no exception over to where I went. Best Smashburgers in the game, nice tender chicken with the right amount of crisp, fries that could possibly beat out McDonald's in the taste test and nobody is touching the shakes because they own that department. It's just comforting that no matter which location you go to, the service is gonna be as consistent and precise, as well as the food being incredible.

First time trying this location and I have to say that the service was good. The lemonade was good. The fries were a bit choppy meaning there there were a lot of small pieces of fires. My wife chicken burger was a bit cold.

Conveniently located Shake Shack just steps away from the 71st Avenue-Forest Hills Subway Station

Seating is plentiful and two single occupancy bathrooms are available.

Prices here are easier to deal with than the other Shake Shacks that are in the City.

Ordered a Double ShackBurger and Fries and it was made exactly as hoped for.

Staff here are friendly and seemingly dedicated to their establishment
The food was great and up to the high Shake Shack standards. The restaurant was nice and big as well as clean which is always a plus. The service was also quick. Overall great experience!

The bun is COLD when the burger just came out! I am dining in and shake shack gave me the burger with cold bun? Wow! ! !

I paid $12 for a burger and you donâ€™t even bother to toast it???

When l asked, their face look like they knew this (as long as no one finds out) no apology and they replaced with the toasted bun.

Canâ€™t image if this becomes normal if you order the take outâ€¦â€¦
The spicy chicken sandwich was great with fries along with a hotdog to share for a quick grab! Quick and speedy service with friendly staff and a pleasant musical ambiance ğŸ‘

Enjoyed the shroom veggie burger with fries. Both were tasty and portion size was adequate. Plenty of space to sit in the back and looks like they have seating upstairs as well. Would like to return and try their drinks and shakes.

I ordered chicken shack and avocado bacon chicken. Chickens were dry, very over cooked. I know shake shack burger is small but in that small buns my chicken was even smaller. In the photo, i had two bites and then checked the burger because chicken was too dry and chewy. And the piece of the chicken was tiny. Very disappointed and not worth it. Please donâ€™t go this place if you want to have a best shake shack go to new hyde park one.

They just installed a done in process where you take a number and they'll deliver the food to your table with the number. Problem is, they still make you get up and go to the counter to fill your own drink. What is the point of forcing the staff to deliver our order to our table if we have to get up anyway and travel to the counter to fill our drink? Makes no sense. Food is tasty though.

I went here for the first time yesterday and I did not realize they had so much seating. They also have a second floor with additional seating. The staff is very nice and they have new kiosk to make a super easy to place your order. I madeâ€¦

Consistently good food, but a bit pricey. The pumpkin shake is delicious, I liked the seeds on top! One thing I donâ€™t like is that thereâ€™s no way to get water to drink here anymore.

Great shake shack in an amazing location. The staff are amazing and the restaurant are is really clean. They have kiosk at the front counter where you can place your order by yourself. This is my first time coming to this location. Theyâ€¦

The good things about Shake Shack in Forest Hills location are clean, wide-spaced and you can order by iPad!

Our favorite burger is definitely shake stack which served with juicy patty and fried mushroom. The fried mushroom was amazingly addictive, the filled cheese was creamy and the outer layer was crispy. We also love their fries, it was fried well, soft inside and not soggy at all.

We wonâ€™t have Shack shake everyday but once in a while.

Some of  the best chicken sandwiches I've ever tasted at a fast food restaurant. The cheese burgers are topnotch,cooked well done and seasoned well.you really get a very tasty and flavorful cheese  burger. I give it a 5 all day,the crinkle French fries great taste ,seasoned just right .nothing burned or un done just a good burger.

This has to be a to be a top burgers and fries joint hands down. I would put them up against most and they would definitely be in the top 5,or 3 even.

There service is really good over there, &the atmosphere was cool and upbeat plus relaxing all at the same time. they even give there  customers a  device that allows  you to see when your meal  is  ready.while waiting for your food.i love the decor in this particular restaurant. They have some nice seats and tables. The restaurant is pretty spacious very clean, plus a good. staff of workers.

This is definitely a good spot for a shake shack restaurant. Right there on busy Austin street one of the most popular shopping streets in forest hills queens.

This is definitely one of my favorite burger and fries spots.i put it in my top  5 in NYC,dont forget about there classic chocolate shacks.

I love this location. I went there recently and noticed they added kiosks which I love since I didn't know you could order pickles and onions on a burger. I also didn't know you could go bun-less. I tried the lettuce wrapped burger withâ€¦

Decent shake shack. If you're looking for a quality burger then this is a decent spot. Been here multiple times and I'm sorry to say each time it's worse. I mean it's nor awful it's just shake shack is always so hectic. And because there's always so many people the food ends up cold sometimes because I'll notice for example they'll make the burgers first or the fries and either one will be cold and the other isn't.  And no body enjoys cold fries or a cold burger. Plus the fact their prices are soaring and portion sizes are small doesnt help. When you try to ask for help here the staff is always too busy. So they just really need some help here.

In only giving this place a 1 star because of one person. A cashier that had a line but decided to talk socially to someone when there was a line of customers.  She had me waiting before even acknowledging me or any other customers for their order. (Check the cameras)On 12-8-22  at around 6-620pm. That was just rude. You wanna talk and hangout at work great we all do ,however make sure that there are no customers there 1st.

Rest of the staff was amazing especially a tall guy makimg sure if people wanted to eat in or dine out. Loved his energy. Unfortunately 1 bad apple ruined the experience.

De beste burger dat ik ooit heb gegeten.
Als eerste maaltijd als je aankomt in Amerika, was dit voor mij overweldigend heerlijk. De Shake Stack is mega lekker.
De cheese fries was goed gebakken en krokant.
We werden goed onthaald en bediend.
Zeker een aanrader!

I came here last week and i ordered 2 shack burgers and a chicken sandwich and fries it disappointed me how the 2 of burgers were raw in the middle. I had to RE-COOK it on my pan so I wonâ€™t get sick or possibly get salmonella since itâ€™sâ€¦

Placed an order over the weekend. Called right away to complain about the food: no one answered the phone, so I left a voicemail. Have not heard back from anyone. I spent $48: items were overcooked, stale tasting and the vegetables were not fresh. The only thing that tasted good was the shake. $48 for one good item out of 6 is awful.
